dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Total darkness surrounds us, except for a streak of pale moonlight coming through a window, illumating a DOOR. We hear a KNOCK, then the jingle of KEYS. After a moment, the door opens and a large, heavyset MAN into the house.  He walks casually through the foyer to a staircase and be climb the stairs. His name is REED. As he climbs the stairs, we hear him in over...

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: They don't advertise for vampire henchman in the newspaper. That's in the special magazines... and  then you don't believe the ads. That was my profession. Ex-roadie. Ex-nurse. Ex-henchman. Sushi, that's what I always called 'em cause he liked to leave 'em in the water like a cold fish...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still dark, the bathroom is lit only by the moon. We can the body of a LIFELESS GIRL, totally naked, in the shower After a beat, the heavyset man enters. Reed laughs self consciously as he turns the shower off. reaches down and picks up the dead girl by her armpits. A lifts her and spins her around... BAM! She smashes right the glass door of the shower!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This smoky, mephistophilian club is being rocked tonight gothic rock band, PLASMA. Fronting the band is ANTHONY. He plays the bass and sings clearly enjoys being the center of attention. Reed's voice over continues...

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: Pretty cool, huh? Yeah, I know. This! This was the night. See, there's Anthony. You can't really see him, but man is he singing! Behind Anthony is SETH, the guitar player.

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: See, now there's Seth. Seth... well, he was always kind of a jerk to me really... As the band plays, we see one particularly good looking c goer as she elbows her way to the front of the stage. She VANESSA.

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: Oh! That... that is Miss Helsing! I remember her. I remember her because that was the night, well, Anthony broke up the band, can you believe it? Yeah. She'd been coming to the shows for a couple of months. I knew Anthony wouldn't like her, cause you know, he likes blondes, but I thought maybe for Seth. I thought Seth might like her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED stands backstage, watching the band as they play. He completely out of rhythm with the song. Several CONCERT GOERS watch his antics in amazement.

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: With the benefit of hindsight, maybe it wasn't such a hot idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOBIN, the drummer, is sitting next to SETH on a couch. T look up as... ANTHONY enters and walks over to a table where a tiny igl cooler sits. He picks up a plastic baggie filled with a d red, viscous liquid, and pours some into his mug via a tu sticking from the bag.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: So?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: It was good. For a last  performance. Seth stops for a second, then continues.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: That's it, just like that?

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: We're getting too big, Seth.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Who are you man, Perry Ferrel?  Things are going great, we've  got offers on the table.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Which is why we have to  fade out. Anthony heads over to a small microwave and puts his mug

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Anthony, think about this.  We're not huge. We don't have a  CD. We've got another couple  months of obscurity. So what's your problem?!

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: You're my problem right now! If you want to run the risk of  being discovered, do it with  another band. Tobin stops drinking, says nothing. Seth glares at Tobin.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Well? Say something, Tobin!  I know you don't want this to end either! Anthony sips from the mug, he exchanges a look with Tobin

dialogues.speaker: TOBIN
dialogues.text: Anthony's right. Seth sighs.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: See it this way, now you can pursue other avenues, do what ever you want

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: I don't want other avenues!  I liked this! This is my ultimate chick magnet.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: The discussion is over. Anthony sips from his mug as the door opens. REED escorts SANDY, a gorgeous blonde, and VANESSA in.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: I'm really gonna miss this. Anthony takes Sandy by the hand and leads her over to a v couch.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: You guys are so great. I mean it.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: I mean, your songs. They're  so deep. I'm not sure I totally  understand all of them, but you  can just tell. You know? Vanessa walks over and lovingly touches Seth's guitar. He follows her hungrily.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Why are you called Plasma?

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: It's kind of an inside joke.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Is that some sort of sick pun? Seth moves in close, grabs Vanessa and pushes her up agai wall.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Sure. Seth moves in on Vanessa and kisses her. Vanessa seems no Reed, noticing the amorous impulses around him, gets uncomfortable and shambles over to the couch where Anthon Sandy are sitting. Reed grins.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Uh. Um, I'm gonna go now.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: You're leaving?

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Uh. Yeah. I gotta be at work  early tomorrow and everything. Sandy reaches out to shake Reed's hand.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: Well, it was nice meeting you.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Oh... I'll see you again. Anthony turns to Reed, flashes him a look. Reed knows he' wrong and blanches.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Uh. Yeah. Bye. Bye Seth. Seth is absorbed with his grovelling and doesn't say anyt

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: I was wondering if you'd like to come back to the house with me. There's only so much of this I can take, you know? Sandy nods in lusty agreement Anthony smiles. He stands and extends his hand out to San Sandy looks over at Vanessa and Seth.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: It was nice meeting you both. Vanessa looks over, Seth continues to nuzzle her.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Bye, Sandy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seth gurgles a goodbye. Anthony and Melissa leave.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: I thought they would  never leave.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Where do you think they're  going?

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Probably back to Anthony's.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Wow. I bet he's got a great  place. Where does he live?

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: I've got a nice place. You  wanna go back there?

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Why don't we go with them?

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Well, to tell you the truth Seth, I was hoping to end up  with Anthony tonight. Seth looks at her. He's a little pissed.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: What! Lead guitar's not good  enough for you? You gotta have  the lead singer? Seth shoves Vanessa down on the couch and jumps on top of putting his hand at her throat.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Take it easy, Seth.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: You want me to prove something,  I'll prove something! I'll be  the best you ever had, bitch!

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Don't bet on it. Vanessa reaches behind her and pulls out a small CANISTER Seth scowls, then bursts into laughter.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: You're gonna mace me? You  have no idea what I am, do  you?

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Maybe. Vanessa fires the mace canister, it hits Seth in the face Seth laughs and bares a frightening set of FANGS!

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Stupid bitch. See, there's  something you don't know  about me... Suddenly, Seth's laughter turns to a SCREAM. His face SMO he collapses in agony.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Yeah. And what would that be? Vanessa walks across the room to where she left her bag.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: You're a vampire? Do tell. Vanessa taps the canister.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Holy water. Seth tries to get up off the floor. He writhes in agony.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: See, I was hoping to take  out Anthony tonight, but I  guess you'll do.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: It hurts! Oh Jesus, it hurts!

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: What do you say, Seth? Why don't  you save me a little footwork  and tell me where Anthony lives.

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Screw you.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Have it your way. Vanessa kicks Seth onto his back. He lurches up and grabs her foot, BITING into her calf! Vanessa screams and sprays him again. He screams and roll

dialogues.speaker: SETH
dialogues.text: Go to hell!

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Thanks, I think I'll pass.  Why don't you go on without me.  And when you see your buddies  down there, do me a favor. Seth looks up to see Vanessa with a STAKE and a HAMMER.

dialogues.speaker: VANESSA
dialogues.text: Tell them Vanessa sent you! With that, Vanessa drives the stake into Seth's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY stands out on his balcony, overlooking a brightly swimming pool. He watches SANDY swim around down below, n She turns over on her back and sees him.

dialogues.speaker: SANDY
dialogues.text: Aren't you gonna come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Establishing the moonlit harbor, and one sailboat in part

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED sitting alone in the cabin of a small, one bedroom sailboat. He hums a nondescript song to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anthony slowly crosses to the pool and slips in. He goes to Sandy. They begin kissing, undulating together, the water becomi perfect medium for their lovemaking. We see only their heads above the surface of the water. Sandy starts to clasp Anthony's head in her hands, her pa becoming more frenzied. He kisses her, moves to her ear, kisses, moves down to he Sandy is in total heaven, her head lolls to one side. Anthony moves his head back just a touch, opens his mouth long enough for us to see the glimmer of his FANGS! As he bites into Sandy's neck, she shrieks and futilely t to push him away. In a moment, she is gone. As Sandy's body goes limp, we see a growing cloud of scar BLOOD as it seeps out into the pool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED sits alone in the boat, a sparsely decorated place. doing some light cleaning as his PAGER goes off. Reed rises, picks his pager off his belt and looks at it. He moves to the door, takes his trenchcoat up along the w exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY sits in his living room, smoking a cigarette on t couch. He's watching the television.  Anthony looks up as he hears a KEY in the front door lock He continues to watch. After a beat, there's a KNOCK on t Anthony rises and heads toward the front door. He walks to the door and yanks it open, revealing REED, c with his head by the door knob. Reed is tethered to the d string around his neck.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: What took you so long?

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: My key. Got stuck. Indeedoor. Anthony moves Reed aside and pulls the key from door. Reed stands up and laughs nervously. He takes the key, wh wears like a pendant, and tucks it back into his shirt. Anthony walks back toward the living room. Reed follows h Anthony looks at Reed impatiently.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Hurry up.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Okay. Reed leaves and heads toward the BEDROOM.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Reed. Reed stops.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: She's in the pool. Reed turns and looks out the window, where he sees the li body of SANDY floating face down.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Oh. Reed heads for the front door. As Anthony continues to watch, we see Reed make his way p side. He looks at the body for a long time, wondering how to ge Then, he looks over and sees a POOL HOOK. He walks over a the tool, then returns to the pool. Anthony stands, glances out at the pool, then retrieves a PHOTO ALBUM from the hearth. He sits down and starts to l through it.

dialogues.speaker: THE PHOTO ALBUM
dialogues.text: The page it has been turned to holds a PHOTOGRAPH of an e gentleman, sitting with a stake in one hand. He has a you sitting on his lap. The man is wearing a celtic cross over his shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ANTHONY looks at the album. In the background, Reed leans out over the pool and tries times to hook the corpse, to no avail. Finally, he balances himself precariously on one foot and his arms out. Just as the hook encircles the body, Reed l balance and goes flailing into the pool. Anthony doesn't even notice. Reed climbs out of the pool and trudges to the window. Anthony is totally absorbed in the photograph. Reed raps on the window. Anthony looks over, sees the soaking wet figure, then sha head. Anthony closes the album and returns his attention television. Reed, discouraged, goes back toward the pool.

dialogues.speaker: THE TELEVISION
dialogues.text: We see THE MALIBU LIFEGUARD WORKOUT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED, still damp, comes into the house, carrying the body SANDY over his shoulder. She is wrapped in a large towel. ANTHONY looks up from the couch.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Finished?

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Yeah. Anthony looks back at the TV.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: See you tomorrow. Reed watches TV over Anthony's shoulder. Then, he takes a SHIP IN A BOTTLE from under his arm and quietly puts it o living room table. Anthony looks up at Reed.

dialogues.speaker: ANTHONY
dialogues.text: Goodnight, Reed.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Um. Okay. G'night. Reed moves to the door and leaves. Anthony turns off the starts toward his bedroom. He stops as he notices the shi He calmly picks it up and walks to a nearby closet. He pu nicknack in the closet and resumes his path to the bedroo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED enters with the body of SANDY. He goes to his bed an throws the limp form down. He walks over to the kitchen and gets a small BOWL, fills water, and returns to the bed. Reed uncovers Sandy. He takes a moment, looks at her pale naked body. He takes a corner of the sheet and dips it in the water, uses the damp piece of cloth to sponge the blood from her humming to himself. Reed gets up and goes to a closet. He rifles through it, A CAMERA, mounted on a tripod. He goes back to the bedside and sets the camera up, point at Sandy. Reed flips her over and positions her on the bed. He disa Moments pass. Reed returns, dressed in a pair of TIGER STRIPED briefs. He takes a position next to Sandy on the bed. He wraps he around him and leans into her. He kisses her neck as we s WHITE FLASH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see a series of shots of REED and SANDY, all in BLACK WHITE, each one ending with the bright FLASH of the camer Reed tries various poses with her, ending with a shot of sitting next to her, fairly relaxed. Again we see a bright white FLASH go off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED is asleep on his bed, there is no sign of Sandy. Ree bolts upright as his ALARM goes off. He looks over at the clock, it reads 4:00 A.M.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED opens a camera case and pulls out a VIDEO CAMERA. He on the power and walks to the bow. He points the camera at the rising sun and starts to film

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: This is Tuesday. Sunrise at five  twenty-nine. Reed tries to keep a steady hand as he films.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED is frantically making his way around the boat, clean He spit shines the tiny brass impliments, swabs the deck. When he's finished he returns the camera case to the inte the boat and steps onto the dock, carrying his completed He checks his watch, then hurriedly jogs back toward the lot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED pulls up in the parking lot of a hospital in a beat up TRUCK. He's dressed in Hospital whites. He hops out of the truck, walks around to the back and pu a bulky ORANGE trashbag that reads, "BIOLOGICAL WASTE". H the bag over his shoulder and rushes toward the hospital.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED walks through the hallway. He stops at a door that r "MORGUE". Reed starts to open the door as someone yells from down t it's DR. PEZ-HUOY.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Buckles! Reed looks up. Pez-Huoy comes over.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Where in god's name have you been?  I've got a patient waiting who  needs his temperature taken, right away.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Okay, I'll be there in a sec.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: You'll be there now, Nurse Buckles.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: I just gotta take care of this..

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Leave it, someone will pick it up.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: No, no..no..no..

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Leave it! Reed hangs his head, he backs away from the door and star heading down the hall.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Stupid jerk. Pez-Huoy looks up.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Oh, Nurse Buckles? Use a rectal  thermometer. Reed curses under his breath as he continues down the hal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VANESSA enters her apartment, tastefully decorated, simpl She opens a Guatemalan backpack and pulls out a small lea SATCHEL. Opening the satchel, she pulls out two WHITE FANGS. She r them around in her hand. As she moves through the apartment, she throws her purse the futon. Vanessa carries the fangs over to a CLOSET. She pulls the open. Inside are the various weapons of a vampire hunter, STAKE CROSSES, GARLIC, HAMMERS. She finds a small wooden BOX. The box is old. On the lid is an inscription; "To Vanessa Father". Vanessa opens the box. Inside are several other FANGS. Sh the new set into the box and closes it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TAMMY, a nine year old is SCREAMING in horror. The reason for her distress is DR. PEZ-HUOY, who is holdi nasty looking syringe.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Now, now. There, there. This  will only hurt for a moment.  We don't want to get any viruses,  do we? REED stands nearby, watching.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Nurse Buckles, would you restrain  her please? Reed looks over and starts toward Tammy, who begins cryin screaming even more. Reed walks over and grabs Tammy and slams her down on the Tammy wails. Pez-Huoy looks over, reacts angrily.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Nurse Buckles! Reed hastily takes his grip off Tammy.  Tammy and Reed both look at eachother, confused. Then, Re moment of inspiration. Reed leans in to Tammy.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Tammy, right? Tammy nods. Reed pulls a small FINGER PUPPET from his pocket. It's a monster. He wiggles it around.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: This is Ogo-Pogo. He helps me,  to be brave. Tammy looks. She stops crying for a second.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: You hold him. Tammy reaches out as Reed takes the finger puppet off his and hands it to Tammy. Tammy wiggles it around. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Now, that wasn't so bad, was it? Tammy looks over and sees that Pez-Huoy is dabbing her ar gauze pad. She looks back at Reed. Reed winks. Tammy grins and looks back down at the finger

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Okay, Tamara. We're all finished.  Go on out and meet your mom. Tammy jumps off the table and runs out the door. Pez-Huoy goes over to his clipboard and writes as he talk

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: That was well done, Nurse Buckles.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: I hate shots.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Yes. Well, you handled that like  a professional. I'm very pleased. Reed smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Be that as it may, you are still  unreliable. And I mean this; if you  are late once more, I will be forced  to replace you. Are we clear? Reed nods his head.

dialogues.speaker: DR. PEZ-HUOY
dialogues.text: Good. Then I'll see you tomorrow.  Eight A.M.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Okay, Doc. Pez-Huoy exits the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A nervous young lab worker, BETH, is looking through a  microscope. REED comes over and stands behind her.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Hi, Beth. Beth jumps in surprise.

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: Reed! You scared me. What  are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Nothing. Just getting ready  to go home. Thought I'd stop by  and say hi, see what's new.

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: Well, it's been an interesting  day. I've done three celebs. Reed stands there with a dull look on his face.

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: Movie stars.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: Yep. One for gonorrhea, one for  herpes, and one for the whole cupcake... all STD's.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: You watch "Baywatch"?

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: Yes. Of course. Beth leans into Reed and whispers in his ear. Reed reacts in shock.

dialogues.speaker: REED
dialogues.text: No! Beth nods. Reed looks crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: BETH
dialogues.text: California. The land of sun,  surf and sexually transmitted diseases. Beth goes back to her microscope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VANESSA is sitting on her futon, sharpening a STAKE. She knife aside and shoves the stake into her backpack, along hammer. She gets up and walks to a different closet, passing a ni stand on the way. On the night stand we see a PHOTOGRAPH, depicting an elderly man, a stake in one hand, his seven daughter on his knee. Vanessa pauses, looks at the photograph. She absently rub fingers over the celtic cross around her neck. She opens the closet and starts fingering through the clo inside. She pulls out her dress for the evening, a real show stop kind of number and takes off toward the bathroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED sits outside Anthony's house in his truck, humming a with the radio. He checks his watch. He reaches into his glove box and pulls out a roll of bre mints. He pops one in his mouth and gets out of the car. Reed starts up the driveway toward Anthony's house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REED comes in through the front door. Stooping down he pu key out of the lock, and heads toward Anthony's bedroom. voice over continues...

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: See, now this is the perfect opportunity for me to explain about some of the things that I did for Anthony that weren't in my job description; like interior design was my main  attempt to create a feng shui in his place... On his way, he glances at the living room table.

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: He was a sailor, he loved the sea, he loved ships and I love them.. he made me love them and he got this thing which is hand blown and he won't put it out and it's beautiful... He turns and heads to the closet, opens it, and retrieves SHIP IN A BOTTLE. He walks across the room and gently sets it down on the t

dialogues.speaker: REED, (VO)
dialogues.text: And I still don't know what hand blown means. Satisfied, he turns to Anthony's bedroom. Back to Top Main Page
